title: sri padmanaba harE
sahitya:
shrI padmanAbha harE pAlaya mAm murArE shrIkara dayasudhA sAgara pItAmbara

anupallavi

 shrIpatE surapatE suSamA bharitAkrtE kSIrArNava vasatE viSNO dAnavArAtE

caraNam

 sAmaja rAja mOkSa dAyaka bhU-nAyaka kAma janaka bhakta kushala vidhAyaka 
sAmaganuta suguNArAma ghanashyAma rAma vana tulasIdAma nEtrAbhirAma
